item.title: Israel-Gaza live updates: 'Gaza is burning,' Israel defense minister says
item.description: The Israeli military began a ground offensive in Gaza City, the Israel Defense Forces said on Tuesday, with two IDF divisions moving into the city.

item.title: Tyler Robinson set to face formal charges in shooting death of Charlie Kirk
item.description: Formal charges will be announced on Tuesday against Tyler Robinson, the alleged assassin that shot Charlie Kirk during an event at Utah Valley Univers...

item.title: WATCH: At least 1 killed in Russian aerial attack on Ukraine
item.description: Ukraine released footage showing buildings and vehicles burning after what they said was an attack by Russia.

item.title: WATCH: Attorney General Pam Bondi claims 'left-wing radicals' killed Charlie Kirk

item.title: WATCH: Indiana gardener born in Ukraine grows world's tallest sunflower
item.description: At 35 feet tall, Alex Babich's sunflower is now the tallest sunflower ever measured. The title holds special significance for Babich since sunflowers ...
